title: Donkey of the Day ( All the Republicans crying to defund the police, now)
itunes:title: Donkey of the Day ( All the Republicans crying to defund the police, now)
description:
Look at the change of heart the republicans have now, after Donald Trump gets his house raided. Now they want to scream defund the police, but when black people were calling for it, they didn't want to hear it! This reason is exactly why Charlamagne gave them "Donkey of the Day".

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
